FuncDef: The system recording-scheme command applies a policy in a recording scheme to record the system events. The undo system recording-scheme command deletes a policy from a recording scheme. System events are not recorded then. By default, system events are not recorded.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a recording scheme.
The recording scheme must already exist.

ExtraInfo: The system events recorded on the server help you monitor devices. When network faults occur, you can locate faults based on the system events recorded on the server.
